description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. This action packed sequel to Bureau- Agent Kendall, stars a sexy FBI agent with special talents. The visually stimulating crime solving continues with enhanced puzzles and mind-bending clues.
